name: Momordica charantia
details: Hairy mordica - has marked drastic properties, producing colic, nausea, vomiting, cholera-like symptoms, abdomen seems full of fluid discharged explosively, thin, watery, yellow. Great thirst. Indian variety - more severe symptoms - intestines full of yellow watery fluid, discharged EXPLOSIVELY - cramps, thirst, prostration. Choleraic symptoms.
